Paul Avila

Web Developer - Computer Enthusiast - Multipotentialite

About

Hello there, I'm Paul Avila, my passion is solving problems and creating work communities or work 'families'. My current aim is to become a knowledgeable web developer / software engineer. I have recently completed a software engineering bootcamp from General Assembly.

During this bootcamp I learned about how a web developer needs to think and skills that are in demand in the tech field. I have a curious mind nad this always has me wanting to learn new things and has made me a bit of a jack of all trades.

Find Me Around the Web

Copyright © Paul Avila 2022

Guiding Light

This is my Capstone project that I worked on in my final week of the bootcamp I attened. The goal of this project was to create a website for the Destiny 2 video game, where players could go and ask for help in certain game modes and group content.(Full site can be found on my github)

Game with Friends

Game with freinds is project created using React. The goal of this particular project was to use experiment with React and React Router to create a SPA. This site uses an api that has a database of free to play games for the internet. The porpose of the siteit to help people find free to play games that they can play solo or with freinds.

Coding-PALs

Coding-PALs is a simple MERN app that was created in a 3 person group. Here my teammates and I used the initals of our first names and the fact we all had dogs as pets to come up with the idea for tbis site. The site was created so that our fellow classmates could share and show off their animal friends to any using the site.

Box Jump

This is the first application/site I created in the coding boot camp I attended. It uses html and css and simple DOM manipulation to create a game where the player jumps of the the red triangle. This was inspired by the impossible game.
